title: Cheesy Beef Soup
ingredients: ['450g minced beef', '75g carrots, grated', '75g celery, chopped', '75g onion, chopped', '750ml chicken stock', '325g cooked white rice', '250g frozen mixed vegetables', '450g Kraft processed cheese slices, unwrapped and chopped', '300g ready-made cheese sauce', '600ml milk', '225ml soured cream', 'chopped fresh chives, for garnish']
